channel.title: Good vps
channel.description:
Hello, what would be a good vps can anyone give me a link
Not vpsland they stole 500$ from me. Nd now theres this opticvps which wont host it for me on vps nd mite loose 200$
Can anyone tell me a good vps please Link me plz
Thanks

item.title: Good vps
item.dc:creator: @Duch-PRO Duch-PRO
item.description:
@Duch-PRO wrote:

What VPSland did?
They did nothing, and that’s the problem!

  1. They block UDP portforwarding which means you will never be able to connect.
  2. Their support is sl000w… (I got my answer after 8 days!)
  3. They have ‘Junior’ and ‘Senior’ support which means they are being overflooded by support.
  4. Their support answers: ‘Yes’, or ‘Try it now’, or ‘This should be resolved now’, which ends up with nothing…
  5. They have alot of problems with their FTP.
  6. If you try to host your private server on their VPS, you are basically ‘scammed’. (I mean, it will never work lol)
  7. The cPanel is quiet complicated while it could be easier (where you find your ftproot? C:/inetpub/ftproot/… WTF?)
  8. The PLESK/cPanel has a weird safety error.

Well these are the reasons that keep me away from hosting another VPS at VPSland!

Read full topic
